title: About

content:
Welcome to the Fairy Hugo Theme! This is a minimal and beautiful blog theme converted from the popular WordPress Fairy theme.
Features This theme includes many great features:
Responsive Design: Looks great on all devices Multiple Layouts: Choose from different sidebar options Clean Typography: Easy to read content Fast Performance: Built with Hugo for speed SEO Friendly: Optimized for search engines Getting Started To get started with this theme, check out the documentation for installation and configuration instructions.
Installation hugo new site mysite cd mysite git clone https://github.com/candidthemes/fairy-hugo themes/fairy-hugo Configuration Copy the example configuration and customize it for your needs.
Enjoy using Fairy!
summary:
Welcome to the Fairy Hugo Theme! This is a minimal and beautiful blog theme converted from the popular WordPress Fairy theme.

Features

This theme includes many great features:

  • Responsive Design: Looks great on all devices
  • Multiple Layouts: Choose from different sidebar options
  • Clean Typography: Easy to read content
  • Fast Performance: Built with Hugo for speed
  • SEO Friendly: Optimized for search engines

Getting Started

To get started with this theme, check out the documentation for installation and configuration instructions.
title: Welcome to Fairy Hugo Theme
